name: Alphaoid
description:
A survival game where you form words in space, on top of moons!

  • A and D to move left and right. SPACE to shoot.
  • Collect letters to form words, destroy unwanted letters.
  • Random words and color schemes for each level.
  • Point based perma-death arcade survival.
  • 5 random levels.
  • Positive portrayal of bears.

<Released: 29th of December 2017>

Developed by invalidsalad

https://twitter.com/invalidsalad_
